name: Lights Out (itch) (TAKO · KO, Nepre, Abramaran, Moai, ziraela)
name_original: Lights Out (itch) (TAKO · KO, Nepre, Abramaran, Moai, ziraela)
description:
Lights Out is a strategy game where you, the lighthouse keeper, must try and light the way for the boats that travel through the archipelago.

Unfortunately, the budget hasn't been the best recently, so to make the ships aware of the islands you will have to turn on and off the light houses accordingly, while never having more than a certain number of them on!

This project is part of the GMTK Gamej Jam 2020 under the theme of 'Out of Control'.
